name: Running Out (In Space)
description:
Made for GBC Game Programming, Fall 2022, Game Engines IV jam. 

The Game: 

Play as an astronaut with depleting oxygen on a ship with shifting gravity. 

Spend your precious oxygen in directional jet boosters to push yourself around in low gravity, then run along the ground to explore during high gravity. 

Collect oxygen tanks to replenish oxygen. 

Collect 5 oxygen tanks to win. 

Controls: 

WASD: Movement 

IJKL: Directional Oxygen Thrusters

Shift/Ctrl: Vertical Oxygen Thrusters

Space: Jump

Esc: Menu
